channel.title: golang on SD
channel.description: Recent content in golang on SD

item.title: Cannon-Go Battle
item.description: Designing games is immensely good fun. It’s so much fun that I tend to bite off more than I can chew. Previously, I had chatted with @rmbreak about making a clone of the classic gorillas game where players throw explosive bananas at each other. One of the main features being that it is relatively simplistic and we might be able to get to a playable state quickly. Although that project has yet to materialize, the motivations for keeping things simple stuck around.

item.title: Static Site Generator - Hugo
item.description: Building a website with Hugo Hugo is a static site generator written in Go (aka golang). It boasts about being super speedy and how it makes building websites fun again. So far I agree with their claims! The LiveReload feature enabled with hugo server --watch is awesome. I often don’t even need to reload the web page to see updates and the rebuilds occur on the order of 5-15 ms for this site.
